NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER

The RTX 4070 SUPER remains one of the best value GPUs in the Ada Lovelace lineup. Excellent at 1440p and capable at 4K with DLSS 3, it's an outstanding choice as prices continue to decrease.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER good for gaming?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER scores 74/100 at 1080p, 72/100 at 1440p, and 58/100 at 4K in our gaming benchmarks. It is best suited for 1440p gaming and value-focused builds.

What is the price of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER has an MSRP of $599 and is currently available for approximately $549.

How much VRAM does the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER have?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER has 12GB of GDDR6X memory on a 192-bit memory bus, providing sufficient memory for 1440p gaming and most creative workflows.

What power supply do I need for the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER has a TDP of 220W. We recommend a minimum 650W power supply. It uses a 1x 8-pin or 1x 16-pin power connector.
